title: AVAST notification on LoL as malware
body: Anyone has any solution or any idea why this is happening?

replies.body:
add exclusion in avast for league. 
This means that it wont scan those files, so no more popups but also security hole if league is having issues. 
http://en.kioskea.net/faq/12294-avast-internet-security-create-an-exclusion
it happened on mine as well but it still patched fine so not sure.
